entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as bending over to check a book on doxies and later positioning herself in front of the curtains to lead the group.

entities.name: gilderoy lockhartâ€™s guide to household pests
entities.description: Gilderoy Lockhart's Guide to Household Pests is described as a book lying open on the sofa, which Mrs. Weasley uses to check information about doxies.

entities.name: doxy
entities.description: Doxies are described as biting and poisonous, and Mrs. Weasley has a bottle of antidote for them. They are also said to be paralyzed by one good squirt from the spray.

entities.name: doxies
entities.description: Doxies are described as biting and poisonous, and Mrs. Weasley has a bottle of antidote for them. They are also said to be paralyzed by one good squirt from the spray.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as spraying the doxies with a spray, and later has been spraying for only a few seconds when a fully grown doxy comes out.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley has a bottle of antidote for doxies, which she mentions before leading the group to spray them.
Mrs. Weasley explains that one good squirt from the spray will paralyze doxies, and later leads the group to spray them.
Harry is described as spraying the doxies with a spray, and later has been spraying for only a few seconds when a fully grown doxy comes out.
